lines.text: What if... the blood isn't even there?
Yeah? And what if it's just part of a <c=#0000FF>Living Memory</c> hologram?
Kid, it's red. The hologram is blue.
But what if that's part of the spell? What if you can show stuff in different colors?
<f=OpenDyslexicSmall>Well nothing technically but</f> it's totally possible!
Yeah? And can the spell do this?
Leo bends down and dips a finger in the blood. It comes away red.
And anyway, even if it was a hologram, they'd need to have blood there to have a memory of.
Alright, okay, I'll lay off the hologram theories.
